title: 移除元素 (Remove Element)
content: 思路: // @Title: 移除元素 (Remove Element) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-06 17:48:23 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 41 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int removeElement(int[] nums, int val) { int start=0,cur=0; while(cur<nums.length){ if(nums[cur]!=val){ nums[start++]=nums[cur]; } cur++; } return start; } } 思路: // @Title: 移除元素 (Remove Element) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-04-13 18:20:27 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 41 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int removeElement(int[] nums, int val) { int left=0,right=0; while(right<nums.length){ if(nums[right]!=val){ nums[left++]=nums[right]; } right++; } return left; } }
